qas.question: What year did a large fire destroy the fishing factory?
When were the new generators installed to correct the power problems?
what was the name of the ship that was a temporary fishing facility?
when was the new fishing factory ready for use?
What destroyed the economy on February 13, 2008?
When was there a fire that destroyed the new facility?

plausible_answers.text: While a new factory was being planned and built

qas.question: When did the fire come to the island to act as a new factory ship?
What came to the island during the fire to act as a factory ship?
By when was the old facility ready?

context: On <b5_0>13 February <a0_0>2008<b5_0/><a0_0/>, <b4_0>fire<b4_0/> destroyed the fishing factory and the four generators that supplied power to the island. On 14 <a1_0>March 2008<a1_0/>, new generators were installed and uninterrupted power was restored. This fire was devastating to the island because fishing is a mainstay of the economy. <b6_0>While a new factory was being planned and built<b6_0/>, <a2_0><b7_0>M/V Kelso<b7_0/><a2_0/> came to the island and acted as a factory ship, with island fishermen based on board for stints normally of one week. The new facility was ready in <a3_0><b8_0>July 2009<b8_0/><a3_0/>, for the start of the 2009–10 fishing season.
